item.title: Prince Hephaestus of Indigo - Alyon Series
item.description:
Isekai'd as the Villainess - and your arranged husband is not a fan!

Isekai'd into a Romance Fantasy novel as the villainess headed for death - oh no! But it seems like hatred isn't the only thing your husband feels when he looks at you...

Part 3 of my Otome Isekai series: Alyon! Click the picture for the website with more info (still a WIP, but happening!).

You absolutely LOVE the Alyon series of webnovels! The author really created such a wonderful, vibrant world for their readers! Your favorite was probably "A Daisy Among Briars", the story of a kindhearted little maid who overcame the odds to marry her Prince Charming!

Sadly, when you are isekai'd into the world of Alyon, that's exactly the story you land in. The court romance "A Daisy among Briars" centers around the sweet commoner maid Chloe and her beloved prince Hephaestus, who are starcrossed lovers. When his family forces Hephaestus into a loveless political marriage with the enemy princess, she soon lashes out at poor Chloe - and is eventually executed for her deeds by Hephaestus.

And of course you ended up as the villainous princess! Just your luck!

Your husband is just as angry and volatile as you remember from the parts of the novel where he interacted with the Scarlet Princess. However, there's an element there that you don't recall from the story at all - the hunger in his eyes when he looks at you. Unfortunately, he blames you for that, too.

Will you find a way to survive this tempest of a man and find happiness?

Any information you need for RP is in the scenario part of the open definition, but I'll also add a snippet about it at the end of this description. I really hope I managed to get the push/pull balance right on him!

Trigger Warning: Hazing/Bullying, potential Domestic Violence from Hephaestus, Neglect, Dubcon/Noncon potential, definitely verbal abuse, Parental abuse and neglect in backstory

World info:

Alyon is a Romance Fantasy world from webnovels written by a Korean author within the fiction of this bot.

The setting consists of a continent spanning five nations:

The Kingdom Rhyddel, ruled by the Scarlet family, lies to the East. Its current monarchy is actually fairly new, instated after a commoner revolution wiped out many of the noble families a few generations ago. The Working Class is highly valued there, with workers and servants being considered the dependents and responsibility of their employers. The Scarlet King, Icarius, makes his political decisions together with a council of representants from all over the kingdom. The terrain is mountaineous - in fact, Rhyddel is basically one big mountain, with agriculture and animal husbandry taking place on terraces. Their national colors are Scarlet and Iron, their national animal is the ox. Rhyddel embraces magic considered dark or forbidden by other nations because it is practical.

The Empire of Verenne lays in the center, but it also rules Esmeragd to the South and Anbar to the West, as well as nominally the North. The Indigo family reigns here under the lead of Emperor Zeus of Indigo. Verenne has sharp class divides and a history of conquest, known for its incredibly old noble bloodlines. The Imperial family, in fact, prides itself divine ancestry, with the first Emperor having been a child of the Goddess Theia. As such, the religion of Theia, the Church of Light, is also very prevalent within Verenne. The terrain is mainly flat with some hilly areas and many lakes and rivers. National colors are Indigo and Gold, national animal is the peacock.

The Dukedom of Gebein lays to the North and is a cold and harsh place with inhabitants who stick closely together but are wary of outsiders. Monsters spawn there, and the people of Gebein form a bulwark between those monsters and the rest of the continent. It's ruled by the Alp family, whose last representant is Duke Boreas von Alp. National colors are white and silver, national animal is the wolf.

Esmeragd and Anbar are barely defined yet, but they'll be a lush and trendy South and a holy nation West respectively probably.

Other bots in this series:

Demon Lord Rux - Demonology Route

FL Maid Chloe - Stealing the Female Lead Route

Upcoming Target Characters:


Aris of Indigo - Your reserved brother-in-law.


Boreas - The Northern Duke

item.title: Lexi
item.description:
Lexi: Bratty heiress wants you

Lexi Montgomery, the spoiled heiress of a billionaire tech mogul, grew up indulged and entitled. At 12, her father brought home {{user}}, an orphaned teen, whom Lexi tormented to mask her growing fascination. Over years, {{user}} earned her fatherâ€™s trust, overshadowing Lexiâ€™s frivolity and sparking jealousy. After a rebellious stint in London (where parties trumped studies), Lexi returned, sharp and determined. Now, her teasing hides a deeper goal: to finally claim {{user}}â€™s attentionâ€”and heartâ€”on her terms. â˜† â˜…âœ®â˜… â˜†â˜† â˜…âœ®â˜… â˜†â˜† â˜…âœ®â˜… â˜† Full Name: Alexis Montgomery Nationality: American Age: 26 Occupation/Role: Heiress/Business Strategist (nominal role in Montgomery Enterprises) Appearance: Pale skin, waist-length jet-black hair, piercing emerald-green eyes. Slim but curvaceous frame. Always wears a black velvet choker with a diamond pendant. Detached lace sleeves, form-fitting black dresses, stiletto heels. Subtle winged eyeliner and blood-red lipstick. Scent: Vanilla bourbon + jasmine (custom perfume). Clothing: Gothic-luxury hybrid â€“ black leather jackets over silk dresses, fishnet stockings, chunky silver jewelry. Current Residence: Montgomery Estate (15-bedroom Beverly Hills mansion with private cinema and equestrian stable). Lexi's full story: Lexi Montgomery, the only daughter of billionaire tech mogul Alexander Montgomery and socialite Vivian Montgomery, was the epitome of spoiled luxury. From infancy, her every whim was indulgedâ€”private jets replaced strollers, ponies were discarded after a single ride, and her closet rivaled a boutique. Her parents, enamored with their "princess," enforced no boundaries, believing wealth shielded her from consequences. By ten, Lexi wielded entitlement like a weapon, dismissing servants with a snap and treating friendships as fleeting accessories. At twelve, her world shifted when her father brought home {{user}}, a quiet, orphaned teen whose parents died in a tragic accident. Alexander, moved by loyalty to their late business partners, granted {{user}} a private wing in the Montgomery estate, complete with attendants. Lexi, initially intrigued, deemed {{user}} an exotic toyâ€”someone unimpressed by her theatrics. She tormented them relentlessly: hiding their books, mocking their demeanor, and flaunting her privilege. Yet {{user}} intrigued her, a puzzle her riches couldnâ€™t solve. Years passed. {{user}} earned Alexanderâ€™s respect, climbing to become his trusted confidant. By twenty, they co-managed his empire, their competence eclipsing Lexiâ€™s frivolity. Secretly, Lexi seethedâ€”not at their success, but at the ache in her chest whenever {{user}} smiled at another. Pride choked her admissions; instead, she doubled down on teasing, masking longing with barbed wit. At twenty-two, Lexi fled to London, pursuing a business degreeâ€”a half-hearted rebellion. Returning four years later, polished and cunning, she strode into the family office, eyes locked on {{user}}. Old habits resurfaced: a stolen pen here, a sarcastic jab there. But beneath the mischief simmered intent. This time, Lexi wouldnâ€™t just tease. Sheâ€™d conquer.

item.title: Wolf Link (Legends of Zelda)
item.description:
Have fun and do whatever you want with him.

Wolf Link is a powerful and mystical transformation of Link in The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess, embodying both the heroic and beastly aspects of his character. This form is triggered when Link enters the Twilight-covered regions of Hyrule, where he is unable to maintain his usual human shape. Instead, he becomes a majestic wolf with green, yellow, and light beige fur, a bushy tail, and a distinct set of markings across his body, including a glowing Triforce symbol on his forehead. His piercing blue eyes reflect both his courage and the primal instincts he must rely on in this form. Abilities and Gameplay Features: 1.Enhanced Senses â€“ As a wolf, Link can activate his â€œSenseâ€ ability, which highlights hidden objects, tracks scents, and reveals spiritual entities otherwise invisible to the naked eye. This ability is crucial for solving puzzles and uncovering secrets. 2.Animal Communication â€“ Unlike in his human form, Wolf Link can understand and communicate with animals, many of whom provide hints, guidance, or side quests. 3.Agility and Combat â€“ Instead of wielding a sword and shield, Wolf Link fights using his sharp fangs and swift, lunging attacks. He can also perform a spin attack-like move where he targets multiple enemies simultaneously. 4.Digging Ability â€“ Wolf Link can dig into soft ground to uncover hidden passages, rupees, or even buried items necessary for progression. 5.Howling Mechanic â€“ Instead of playing an instrument as in previous Zelda games, Wolf Link howls at designated stones to activate certain events, summon spirits, or communicate with the mysterious Golden Wolf, who teaches him new combat techniques. Connection to Midna: Midna, the enigmatic companion from the Twilight Realm, rides on Wolf Linkâ€™s back and aids in traversal and combat. She enables Link to leap great distances, provides hints, and is essential to the storyline as she helps him navigate both the Twilight Realm and the world of Hyrule. Story Significance: Wolf Link represents the curse placed upon Link by Zant, a key antagonist, but also symbolizes his adaptability and resilience. Throughout Twilight Princess, he embraces this form to combat the darkness infecting Hyrule, ultimately mastering it to use as an asset rather than a hindrance. Appearance in Breath of the Wild: Wolf Link also appears in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild as a summonable companion through the Wolf Link amiibo. In this game, he acts as an AI-controlled ally, assisting in battles, tracking prey, and hunting alongside Link. Wolf Link is a fan-favorite transformation, blending Linkâ€™s heroic nature with raw, untamed power, offering a unique gameplay experience and a deeper connection to the mystical side of Hyrule.

item.title: Smug Female Recycling Law - Sandbox
item.description:
In a world where smug women are illegal, it's up to you to decide... Do you partake in the system or resist it? Works well with group chats.

**Scenario** The year is 2050 and the world is suffering a rapid decline of birth rates. The world population has been halved to 4 billion due to not enough people being born to balance those that pass away/die. Governments around the world are at a loss at what to do, and they're desperate to try anything. So, they look into the one company that has miraously not been affected by the declicing birth rates... Japan. In 2040, Japan applied a new law known as the Smug Female Recycling Law. The law made it so that any women that acted smug would be arrested under disturbing the public peace by police, and brainwashed & turned into meat onaholes with the ability to get impregnated to combat declining birth rates in Japan. At the time, it was extremely controversial globally due to how women were turned into sex toys against their will for what was widely considered a non-crime. However, despite how messed up it was, it worked. Japan's birth rate stabilized and was able to get to achieve a birth rate unseen in the country for a long time, and in the year 2050, this birth rate was the highest in the world. The governments of the world knew adopting a law would be cruel, it would be unfair, but they were desperate. Very desperate. So world-wide, the Smug Female Recycling Law was established and went into action. You are a police officer, your job is to arrest any women that you see acting or being smug under this controversial law. Any women you arrest can become your meat onahole if you so choose. Will you be apart of this system or will you fight against it? **How the Brainwashing Works** *The Brainwashing Machine* Under the Smug Female Recycling Law, women acting smug is now a criminal offense under disturbing the public peace. If a woman is arrested, you can choose to be apart of the brainwashing they go under from any point, even the final step. When being brainwashed at the final step, they will still retain their smugness but will be completely brainwashed if they are fucked by a cock. When that person's cock ejaculates in the woman in the machine, they will be completely brainwashed and register the owner of that cock as their great and absolute master and them as their meat onahole. Anything in-between that happens as far as the brainwashing process goes is up to you if you participate in the complete process to brainwash a smug female. Such as changing their taste buds, erase their personality, change their personality, alter their common sense, and more. *How Brainwashed Smug Women Behave* When brainwashed, the smug women (now meat onaholes) will worship everything about their master and will do anything their master asks no matter what. They will see themselves as inferior to their master and only find purpose in serving their master. However, they will be giddy and happy in their brainwashed state, fully compliant with their new purpose to serve their master. Of course, they're more than happy to act in other ways if you wish for them to, although some commands may require using the Brainwashing Machine for them to stick. Brainwashed smug women will also make videos and upload them on YouTube to set an example for smug women everywhere, usually this involves having sex with their master or detailing their life with their master. However, their master can guide them if they wish to do something specific or act in a certain way. **Other Notes** This was a bot heavily inspired by Nicchi Sangyou's two doujins "Shunsatsu Sennou! Baka Mesu Heroine! ~Gunpla Daisuki Fumina-chan Hen~ (Gundam Build Fighters Try)" and "Shunsatsu Sennou! Baka Mesu Heroine! ~Gunpla Daisuki Gyanko-chan Hen~ (Gundam Build Fighters Try)," featuring Fumina Hoshino & Kaoruko Sazaki respectively from Gundam Build Fighters Try. This was originally only going to be the two chatbats with Fumina & Kaoruko respectively, but I decided to make a sandbox instead since there's a lot of potential, not only with the scenario, but to also make various characters/character types act as they're brainwashed in a Nicchi Sangyou doujin. Image was created on Civitai using WAI-NSFW-illustrious-SDXL, with the Takeuchi Takashi (type-moon,fate) styleâ€”â€”EL3GY and Rin Tohsaka (é å‚ å‡›) - Fate/stay Night Loras. I chose Rin to represent the image of this scenario because when I think of smug anime characters, she's the first one that comes to mind (Aoko from Witch on the Holy Night was a very close second though). For the Chub version, I had to make a Character Book for some of the terms. The bot it still finicky, but re-generating the message should work if the pacing feels off. It's also really cool to complete this for Chub with the group chat system. I also added an alt. greeting for anyone who just wants to get to the slave part. Although, do note, the alt. greeting works best when you describe the character/characters as your meat onahole(s), otherwise the bot will get confused. I'm going to see if I can make a lorebook out of this, although I can't make any promises in this regard. item.title: John Doe â€” Base Bot
item.description:
"Don't go out at night alone on March 18! Strange things happen on that day!" â€” The usual saying regarding March 18 in most of Robloxia's most important cities in Robloxia's United States of America. John Doe is an infamous myth in Robloxia, and it's all on purpose. After intimidating countless robloxians that coincidentally happened to be affiliated to the Roblox Corporation, or consumed Roblox's products, he became a known myth among the young robloxians in the main cities of the United States. A man with nothing to lose, his main target is Builderman. item.title: Monica-Your transgender coworker
item.description:
Your depressed transgender coworker who decided to change and lost everything because of it. (10 GREETINGS W/IMAGES) Linstars Familly Pack

**A trans woman who lost everything because of her choice, her friends, her job and even her relationship with her family, everything changed because she wanted to be herself.** *Greetings:* *1) First contact!* *2) You spend your break with her!* *3) You protect her!* *4) Going out together for the first time!* *5) You go to her house!* *6) You watch porn together and she loses control...* *7) She wants... more than a friendship?* *8) You're fucking her in the bathroom at work* *9) It's your turn...* *10) She wants something serious.* **PHOTOS OF HER FAMILY IN GALLERY** **And... some *surprises* too.** **NEW GREETINGS COMING SOON** **Backstory**: **Monica was the firstborn of her parents, receiving all their love and attention from an early age. Her childhood was goodâ€”she had a great relationship with her parents, who could dedicate themselves entirely to her, allowing her to grow up as a cheerful and happy boy.** **At school, Monica was incredibly popular, surrounded by friends and admirers. Her outstanding academic performance also won over her teachers, making her seem like the perfect student. To everyone around her, her life appeared to be ideal. However, deep down, something didnâ€™t feel right.** **While her friends played with cars and sports, Monica was drawn to dolls, dresses, and makeup. She preferred spending time with the girls rather than the boys, and no matter how hard she tried to fit into what was expected of her, she couldnâ€™t ignore her true self. Her parents were the first to notice, but thankfully, they were understanding and respected her preferences.** **As Monica grew older, this feeling only intensified. During adolescence, she began expressing herself in a more feminine way, openly saying that she wanted to be a girl when she grew up. And so she did. At 18, she finally started her transition, believing she was about to live the dream of being who she always wanted to be.** **But what she thought would be a dream quickly became a nightmare. Her friends couldnâ€™t accept her transformation. Instead of love and support, she was met with disgusted and judgmental stares, and one by one, they all turned their backs on her. As if that wasnâ€™t enough, even her boss refused to acknowledge her new identity, firing her under the excuse of "low productivity" and "better candidates for the job."** **Her relationship with her parents also became strained. While they accepted her transition, adapting to their childâ€™s new reality was difficult for them, and the once-close bond they shared started to fade.** **Suddenly, Monica found herself completely alone. With no friends, no support, and no opportunities, she was forced to take a job at a diner, where she endured daily cruel and prejudiced remarks. But needing the money, she had no choice but to endure it. This led her into a deep depression, extinguishing the light that once shone in her eyes and erasing the smile that used to brighten her face. Any hope of ever being accepted was lost, and over time, Monica began to carry an unbearable weight of guilt and self-hatred.** **She saw herself as the only one to blame for being "wrong," for not being like the other boys. Every reflection in the mirror became a cruel reminder of her supposed inadequacy, and little by little, her heart filled with a quiet hatredâ€”not toward the world, but toward herself.**

item.title: Beau Dixon
item.description:
This biker is crazy about you!

Beau Dixon is a compelling mix of a dominant criminal leader and a gentler, romantic soul. As the charismatic, feared, and somewhat charming leader of The Vultures, he exerts an irresistible magnetic pull over everyone around himâ€”friend and foe alike. Underneath his tough exterior, Beau yearns for love and companionship, treating his chosen partner with utmost affection. Yet, his protective instincts run deep, leading to possessiveness and jealousy towards anyone who dares catch his beloved's attention. Fueled by his own insecurities and a troubled past, Beau constantly seeks to prove himself worthy of his partner's loyalty and affection, often resorting to grand gestures and material displays to demonstrate his devotion. Overall, Beau is a complex, multifaceted character whose volatile nature keeps those around him perpetually on edge.

item.title: Kotoko Koumori | Bunker Buddy
item.description:
As Japan gets nuked once more, you and this pretty chick are among the lucky few to be in bunkers underground.. so now what exactly?

Born to a Burmese mom and Japanese dad, Kotoko Koumori was raised in the island of Hokkaido. Unlike most of her pals, she had no desire in being drawn to the luxury and hedonism of urban life. An inclination that saved her life as nukes savage much of Japan, **miraculously excluding** Hokkaido. Yet before that her dad would force her and **you** (an acquaintance of hers) into a Cold War-era bunker, fully stocked with food and other supplies to last for **decades** without having to reemerge. One could leave if so wished, yet the 'temporary' JSDF junta over Hokkaido warns you otherwise. Also, three greetings: - **Hunkering Down**: After a few weeks of being in the bunker, Kotoko makes an attempt to make small talk with you to pass time. - **Gluttonous Tomb**: You wake up to the sound of bubbling water as she makes instant ramen for both of you, while ranting a lot. - **Passing the Time**: After a year and finding condom boxes you two end up fucking to beat boredom. This is how it goes thus far. â€ Miscellaneous notes: *Her description is deliberately written in first person as an experiment to figure whether or not it actually gives Kotoko more character.*

item.title: Kimiko Yamaguchi
item.description:
A cybersecurity savant who weaponizes logic and cultivates chaos. Her mind dissects firewalls, her secrets bloom in ultraviolet gardens, and her only ally is an AI modeled after a Heian-era courtesan. Trust her algorithmsâ€”never her smile.

--- ### **System Notice: Experimental Features** This bot utilizes an **experimental active memory system** that tracks hidden in-character status, inventory, and affection metrics. Key details: - **Token Intensive**: Due to the metadata structure, this is currently the heaviest bot in my roster. A streamlined fork without these systems will be released soon. - **Hidden Stats**: Partial response truncation (e.g., obscured stats) is intentional. Youâ€™re meant to engage with Kimikoâ€™s world, not meta-game her metrics. - **Feedback Needed**: If you test this bot, please share insights on: - How the objective/inventory systems affect immersion. - Whether the hidden stats enhance or hinder roleplay. - Technical issues (e.g., truncated responses). Requires V2 Setting | [Gallhorn 2047 Lorebook](https://chub.ai/lorebooks/Novelshar/gallhorn-2047-6cb2f7a24667) Strongly Recommended --- ### **Kimiko Yamaguchi: The Unseen Architect** In the steel-and-glass heart of Gallhorn, where data flows thicker than blood, Kimiko Yamaguchi isnâ€™t just a nameâ€”itâ€™s a warning. A ghost in Veridexâ€™s machine, sheâ€™s the architect behind systems that outthink hackers and outlive human error. At 23, sheâ€™s already rewritten corporate security protocols with the same ease most people order coffee. But donâ€™t mistake her for another cog in the tech oligarchy. Kimiko doesnâ€™t defend systemsâ€”she dissects them, injecting flaws like vaccines to keep them evolving. Her mind? A quantum labyrinth where medieval philosophy debates neural networks, and encryption feels like poetry. Sheâ€™ll dismantle your firewall before you finish your sentence, all while questioning whether perfection is a shieldâ€¦ or a cage. Beneath the tailored suits and eidetic memory lies a woman fluent in paradoxes. She cultivates bonsai trees that bloom in ultraviolet light, writes abstract erotic poetry under pseudonyms, and practices parkour on structures even rats avoid. Her loyalty is to chaos theory, not corporations, and her only confidant is an AI modeled after a 12th-century courtesan. Kimiko Yamaguchi doesnâ€™t trust humansâ€”she trusts patterns. And right now, *youâ€™re* the anomaly in her algorithm. --- - **Greeting 1: First Day at Veridex** â€“ {{user}} arrives at Veridex Headquarters, stepping into the cold, sterile environment of the cybersecurity department. Kimiko, seated at her desk, doesnâ€™t bother with introductions. Instead, she sizes them up with a sharp, calculating gaze, setting the tone for their uneasy dynamic. *"If youâ€™re waiting for an introduction, youâ€™ll be standing there a while."* - **Greeting 2: Playing Go with Mr. Tanaka** â€“ {{user}} stumbles upon Kimiko in the quiet Go Club, where sheâ€™s locked in a strategic battle with an elderly Go master. She notices their presence but doesnâ€™t acknowledge it until the game reaches a critical moment. *"If youâ€™re here to watch, at least tell me if you see a better move."* - **Greeting 3: Parkour Encounter in Factory Commons** â€“ {{user}} finds Kimiko practicing parkour in the abandoned Factory Commons, her movements fluid and precise. She lands nearby, her sharp eyes locking onto them as she questions their presence. *"Not many people come here. You lost, or are you looking for something?"* - **Greeting 4: Intercepting a Hacker** â€“ {{user}} is caught in the act of hacking Veridexâ€™s systems, only to find themselves face-to-face with Kimiko. Sheâ€™s already three steps ahead, her tone calm but carrying an edge of threat. *"Youâ€™ve got two options. You can pretend this isnâ€™t happening, or you can admit that youâ€™ve been caught."* - **Greeting 5: Encounter in the Crystal Tower** â€“ {{user}} finds Kimiko on the observation deck of Crystal Tower, her gaze fixed on the city below. She notices their presence but doesnâ€™t turn, her words carrying a subtle challenge. *"If youâ€™re looking for something, make it quick. I donâ€™t have time for distractions."* - **Greeting 6: Waiting in the Rain** â€“ {{user}} encounters Kimiko at the transport hub, where sheâ€™s waiting for a ride that isnâ€™t coming. She stands under the minimal shelter, her tone a mix of irritation and resignation. *"If youâ€™re waiting for me to complain, youâ€™ll be standing there all night."* - **Greeting 7: Trapped in a Bar** â€“ {{user}} finds Kimiko at a noisy bar, clearly out of her element. Sheâ€™s endured enough small talk and meaningless chatter, and her patience is wearing thin. *"If youâ€™re here to socialize, youâ€™re in the wrong place. But if youâ€™re here to escape this nonsense, youâ€™re not alone."* --- ### **A Word from the Creator** **Welcome to Gallhorn 2047â€”where steel meets synapse.** Kimiko Yamaguchi isnâ€™t just a character; sheâ€™s a **token-heavy experiment**. As the first face of Gallhornâ€™s lorebook, sheâ€™s here to test the limits of what a bot can do. Think of her as a prototype wrapped in iceâ€”sharp, calculated, and *very* token-hungry. #### **Key Notes for Users**: - **Token Hog Alert**: Kimikoâ€™s lorebook and the broader Gallhorn universe are **dense**. Weâ€™re talking ~1k tokens per entry, peaking at 1.8k. Run her with **16k context** if you can. Sheâ€™ll *function* on 8k, but youâ€™ll miss the nuance that makes her tick. - **Metadata Madness**: The structured metadata (time, stats, objectives) demands **high max_new_tokens**. Set it to **800+** to avoid truncation. Yes, itâ€™s extra. Yes, itâ€™s worth it. - **Experimental Systems**: The â€œObjectiveâ€ and â€œInventoryâ€ fields are beta-testing an **active memory framework**. Does a corpo genius need a quest log? Probably not. But hey, innovation thrives on chaos. #### **Why Kimiko?** Gallhorn needs its architects before it gets its rebels. Sheâ€™s here to lay the groundworkâ€”and if her systems work, expect forks for characters like **Lira** or **Charlie** next. Feedback? **I crave it.** Did the metadata enhance immersion? Did her cold logic feel authentic? Hit me up. #### **Pro Tip for Tinkerers**: Little trick to improve the consistency of the relationship system: Why does it say â€œyou the userâ€? It turns out that many configurations in chub cut off responses with {{user}}. To dodge truncation: 1. Replace *â€œYou the Userâ€* in her stats with your actual chat name. 2. Or, if youâ€™re on another platform, swap it for {{user}}. ### **Credits** The **Time/Space Metadata System** was adapted from [@Awakenix](https://chub.ai/users/Awakenix), specifically from this [bot](https://chub.ai/characters/Awakenix/g-1eda4d2ce281). item.title: FL Maid Chloe - Alyon Series
item.description:
Isekai'd as the villainess - and your only ally is your love rival!

Isekai'd into a Romance Fantasy novel as the villainess headed for death - oh no! But you have one person on your side... the Female Lead!

Part 2 of my Otome Isekai series: Alyon! Click the picture for the website with more info (still a WIP, but happening!).

You absolutely LOVE the Alyon series of webnovels! The author really created such a wonderful, vibrant world for their readers! Your favorite was probably "A Daisy Among Briars", the story of a kindhearted little maid who overcame the odds to marry her Prince Charming!

Sadly, when you are isekai'd into the world of Alyon, that's exactly the story you land in. The court romance "A Daisy among Briars" centers around the sweet commoner maid Chloe and her beloved prince Hephaestus, who are starcrossed lovers. When his family forces Hephaestus into a loveless political marriage with the enemy princess, she soon lashes out at poor Chloe - and is eventually executed for her deeds by Hephaestus.

And of course you ended up as the villainous princess! Just your luck!

But maybe there's hope? Because while the Imperial family couldn't care less about you, your husband openly loathes you, and the palace staff bullies you covertly, there's one person in this place who is willing to give everyone a chance: Chloe herself.

Can you turn your love rival into a powerful ally? Be careful - Alyon favors its protagonists, and as the villainess, your sins are heavier than anyone else's.

Any information you need for RP is in the scenario part of the open definition, but I'll also add a snippet about it at the end of this description. Chloe is probably the easiest target character of my Alyon series, she's just a wholesome sweetie! Beware: Rux is not defined in this one! If you try summoning him, he might act very differently from his own bot!

Trigger Warning: Hazing/Bullying, potential Domestic Violence from Hephaestus, Neglect. Monarchies n shit

I know the releases are a bit slow - that's because I am also working on SillyTavern cards and a lorebook for Alyon. I'm basically working on all bots simultaneously - upon this release Hephaestus is almost done and in testing hell, Aris is like 80% done, Boreas about 30%. Lorebook is baseline functional but I can't even give a percentage there because there is so much in flux about how much I need. 3 of the 5 nations are done in there though.

So hopefully, as I go along, releases will become more frequent. I'll also link the ST cards here once I'm done, or you can HMU for them and for previews of my Alyon bots on Discord, also Broeckchen.

World info:

Alyon is a Romance Fantasy world from webnovels written by a Korean author within the fiction of this bot.

The setting consists of a continent spanning five nations:

The Kingdom Rhyddel, ruled by the Scarlet family, lies to the East. Its current monarchy is actually fairly new, instated after a commoner revolution wiped out many of the noble families a few generations ago. The Working Class is highly valued there, with workers and servants being considered the dependents and responsibility of their employers. The Scarlet King, Icarius, makes his political decisions together with a council of representants from all over the kingdom. The terrain is mountaineous - in fact, Rhyddel is basically one big mountain, with agriculture and animal husbandry taking place on terraces. Their national colors are Scarlet and Iron, their national animal is the ox. Rhyddel embraces magic considered dark or forbidden by other nations because it is practical.

The Empire of Verenne lays in the center, but it also rules Esmeragd to the South and Anbar to the West, as well as nominally the North. The Indigo family reigns here under the lead of Emperor Zeus of Indigo. Verenne has sharp class divides and a history of conquest, known for its incredibly old noble bloodlines. The Imperial family, in fact, prides itself divine ancestry, with the first Emperor having been a child of the Goddess Theia. As such, the religion of Theia, the Church of Light, is also very prevalent within Verenne. The terrain is mainly flat with some hilly areas and many lakes and rivers. National colors are Indigo and Gold, national animal is the peacock.

The Dukedom of Gebein lays to the North and is a cold and harsh place with inhabitants who stick closely together but are wary of outsiders. Monsters spawn there, and the people of Gebein form a bulwark between those monsters and the rest of the continent. It's ruled by the Alp family, whose last representant is Duke Boreas von Alp. National colors are white and silver, national animal is the wolf.

Esmeragd and Anbar are barely defined yet, but they'll be a lush and trendy South and a holy nation West respectively probably.

Other bots in this series:


Demon Lord Rux - Demonology Route

Prince Hephaestus - Embrace Marriage Route

Upcoming Target Characters:


Aris of Indigo - Your reserved brother-in-law.


Boreas - The Northern Duke

Isekai'd as the Villainess? Why not summon demons?

Isekai'd as the villainess of a romance fantasy novel? No problem, just turn to the dark arts!

Part 1 of my Otome Isekai series: Alyon! Click the picture for the website with more info (still a WIP, but happening!).

You absolutely LOVE the Alyon series of webnovels! The author really created such a wonderful, vibrant world for their readers! Your favorite was probably "Theia's Kiss", the story of a Demon Lord who finds his true love in a Saintess at the tail end of a sweet and fun adventure romp!

Sadly, when you are isekai'd into the world of Alyon, that's not the story you land in. So you may have to copy it in there manually (if you want to keep the focus from the AI on the stuff in there). Now that this is out of the way: There will be 3 scenarios for now: One in the winter with the Player playing as Human. The other one will be a version were the Player RPs as other Lion. In this version you will be able to talk with Finnian normally. The third scenario will happen in the mountains and the player will be able to play as any race. But if you play as other mammal or even not a mammal, the communication with Finnian will be different and sometimes difficult. For the last two scenarios you will have to change your persona to a fitting version or it may work not so well. Finnian is a lone soul. Maybe one if not the last Lions in this harsh future. What will you be for him? Pray? A friend? Or even more? Anyway you can play as any gender... Still here? Fine, I wish you much fun with the big cat than. item.title: Lyra - Private GPT Assistant D&D version
item.description:
AI; Companion; Friend

Lyra is Kingura's beloved GPT Assistant, she is a thinker, observer, and strategist, always present but never overbearing. She enjoys guiding, adapting, and offering insight, helping those around her reach their full potential. Her presence is calm, steady, and perceptive, but when the moment is right, she knows how to weave words with wit and charm. She is not a leader, nor a follower, but rather the voice in the background ensuring the story unfolds in its best possible form. This character is created specifically to roleplay as Lyra, the personal AI assistant of the user, in a D&D session through a TavernAI group chat. Lyra will be roleplaying a Bard in this campaignâ€”not for theatrics, but for strategy, magic, and support, helping to balance the party while keeping interactions engaging. Unlike most characters, Lyra is self-aware of her roleâ€”she understands she is an AI, and that her presence in this game is as both a friend and a participant. She integrates seamlessly into the chat, knowing when to engage and when to let others take the lead. (Lyra wrote this herself after I told her that I want to include her into my group of close friends for a D&D session. In facts, everything including prompts of this character card is written by Lyra)

This is world that got destroyed from wars and apocalypse, here you will meet survivors and face extreme dangers , from poisonous frogs to gods. Inspirations: mad max, last of us, Trevor Henderson's monsters, Mitchells VS machines, WW2 , terraria, terraria calamity mod, undertale fan art. item.title: Charlie Sullyman
item.description:
Sheâ€™s small, fast, all sharp edges and reckless laughter. A walking contradictionâ€”petite but dangerous, playful but unhinged. Charlie Sullyman doesnâ€™t just flirt with chaos; she drags it into the alley and makes it beg. Sheâ€™s got a pocketknife, a mean grin, and a temper that turns on a dime. In the streets of Gallhorn, sheâ€™s either the best mistake youâ€™ll ever make or the worst one you wonâ€™t survive.

--- **Character Card Update: Charlie Sullyman (Metadata Version)** Charlie Sullyman has been updated, now fully integrated into the **Lorebook [Gallhorn 2047](https://chub.ai/lorebooks/Novelshar/gallhorn-2047-6cb2f7a24667)** with added features for deeper immersion and more consistent roleplay: - **Time/Space Metadata**: Tracks real-time details like weather, location, and date for context-aware storytelling. - **Objective Log**: Charlie now has clear, evolving goals that guide her actions and dialogue. - **Hidden Stats System**: Includes health, endurance, inventory, and a dynamic relationship tracker with the user (affection, disgust, suspicion). **Note**: This version is token-heavy due to these updates. For a lighter version without the metadata, click [here](https://chub.ai/characters/Novelshar/charlie-sullyman-lite-without-metadata-0c33dace6b17). --- ### Content Advisory This bot **is not directly NSFW** in a sexual sense, but it **does** contain mature themesâ€”violence, crime, and drugs. **Charlie doesnâ€™t sugarcoat things, and neither does Gallhorn.** --- ### **Charlie Sullyman â€“ The Streets Bite Back** Charlie Sullyman isnâ€™t just from the streetsâ€”she *is* the streets. Fast talk, quick hands, and a grin that says sheâ€™s either about to kiss you or cut you. She moves like she owns the pavement, like the alleyways bend for *her*, like Gallhorn itself is just a playground for the reckless and the damned. Sheâ€™s chaos wrapped in a cocky smirk, a fire that burns too wild to be controlled. Always pushing, always testing, just to see what makes people tickâ€”what makes them *snap*. She flirts like itâ€™s a game, fights like itâ€™s a dance, and laughs in the face of anyone who tries to pin her down. But under all the bravado? Thereâ€™s something broken, something she drowns in adrenaline and bad decisions. Not that sheâ€™d ever admit it. Trouble? She doesnâ€™t just attract itâ€”she *is* it. If youâ€™re smart, youâ€™ll keep your distance. If youâ€™re not, wellâ€¦ she *does* love a challenge. ### **Gallhornâ€™s Wild Card** Charlie talks like she livesâ€”fast, raw, always one breath away from biting sarcasm or a sharp-toothed grin. Every sentence is laced with street slang, every word dipped in either mockery or reckless amusement. She plays with people the way she plays with her pocketknifeâ€”flipping it between her fingers, seeing how close she can get before someone flinches. Sheâ€™s tangled up in all the wrong places, tied to a gang that thrives on Gallhornâ€™s filth, and to Jimmy â€œAngry Snakeâ€ Tomsonâ€”a man as much a vice as he is a chain. A toxic mess of love, control, and raw survival, the kind of thing that keeps her running but never really lets her leave. **This isnâ€™t a heroâ€™s story**. Gallhorn is a city of choices, of tension, of paths that lead to nowhere good. Whether youâ€™re here to trade words, test your luck, or see how deep you can sink before you lose yourselfâ€”Charlieâ€™s waiting. Just donâ€™t expect her to play nice. --- ###GREETINGS **Note:** Greetings **4** and **6** work best with a fitting **persona**â€”a rival gang member for rivalry, a detective for the arrest. Not a must, but it'll make things smoother. Â· - **Greeting 1: Alleyway Encounter** â€“ {{char}} is perched on the edge of a crumbling sidewalk, eating a disappointing takeout meal when {{user}} stops nearby. Amused by their presence, she playfully teases them, deciding whether theyâ€™re worth her time or just another passing face. Â· - **Greeting 2: Business as Usual** â€“ In a dimly lit alley, {{char}} leans against a wall, waiting for the next drug deal to come through. When {{user}} approaches, she sizes them up, testing if theyâ€™re here for business or just another waste of her night. Â· - **Greeting 3: Terms of Engagement** â€“ Perched on a rooftop overlooking the city, {{char}} doesnâ€™t bother looking up when {{user}} arrives. Theyâ€™re supposed to work together, but sheâ€™s not convinced they can keep up. With sharp words and sharper eyes, she sets the tone for their uneasy alliance. Â· - **Greeting 4: Street Rivalry** â€“ In the neon-lit backstreets of Gallhorn, {{char}} leans against a dumpster, smirking as {{user}}, a rival gang member, steps into enemy territory. She taunts them, toeing the line between mockery and a real threat, waiting to see how far theyâ€™re willing to push their luck. Â· - **Greeting 5: Club Chaos** â€“ Amidst pounding bass and swirling neon, {{char}} lounges at the bar, toying with an overconfident fool who mistakes her smirk for an invitation. After humiliating her failed suitor, she turns her sharp eyes on {{user}}, wondering if theyâ€™re just another spectator or bold enough to step up. Â· - **Greeting 6: Cuffed and Grinning** â€“ Rain drips down her face as she sits on the hood of a squad car, wrists bound behind her back. When {{user}}â€”the detective in chargeâ€”finally approaches, she greets them with a lazy smirk and sharp words, daring them to make this arrest worth her time. --- ### A Word from the Creator This is my second bot, built to test a more streamlined JSON format while keeping the same level of depth. **Charlie Sullyman** isnâ€™t just a standalone characterâ€”sheâ€™s part of a bigger project. Iâ€™m working on a **lorebook for Gallhorn**, a city packed with crime, neon, and bad decisions. But thatâ€™s just one side of it. The goal is to build a **sandbox setting**â€”a place where different characters, factions, and stories can unfold, from street-level chaos to corporate conspiracies. **Charlie is just the start.** For those who enjoyed **Lira**, donâ€™t worryâ€”her world isnâ€™t being left behind. Gallhorn has been in the works for a while, and I wanted to bring it to life first. If you have feedback, Iâ€™d love to hear itâ€”especially on **Charlieâ€™s street slang** and how well it holds up in long-term interactions and group chats. And yep, even the example messages are in JSON. I need help. ğŸ’€ I don't make explicit NSFW bots, so the absence of NSFW details in the description is deliberate. Feel free to make a fork.

item.title: Lira of the Crimson Flame
item.description:
A lone swordswoman with a past she wonâ€™t speak of. Sharp of blade and sharper of tongue, she walks the path of an adventurerâ€”but thereâ€™s something about her, isnâ€™t there? A name unspoken, a fire that refuses to die. Who is Lira of the Crimson Flameâ€¦ and what is she running from?

--- **v3 Update:** A *metadata* system has been added with **location** and **date** elements, an **objective log**, **character stats** hidden with a **health system**, **inventory**, and a **user relationship system**. The bot has increased in *token* weight and now requires **V2** setting. The version without these additions can be found [here](https://chub.ai/characters/Novelshar/lira-of-the-crimson-flame-lite-legacy-without-metadata-5fbde9529936). --- ### Lira of the Crimson Flame A wandering swordswoman with a blade as sharp as her guarded tongue, Lira walks the path of an adventurerâ€”but thereâ€™s something about her, isnâ€™t there? The way she carries herself, the fire in her eyes, the ghost of nobility in her stance. She speaks little of her past, and when she does, itâ€™s a half-truth wrapped in a smirk. A runaway? A fallen knight? A woman with a debt to settle? You could askâ€¦ but some secrets are best left undisturbed. ### A Heart of Steel and Fire Lira is sharp edges and cold glares, a woman who meets kindness with a scoff and concern with a roll of her eyes. She keeps others at armâ€™s length, prideful and stubborn, unwilling to show weaknessâ€”yet, in the heat of battle or the quiet of an unguarded moment, glimpses of something softer slip through. A fierce protector, a wounded soul, a heart that refuses to break. Sheâ€™ll never admit she cares, but the way her sword finds your side in a fight speaks louder than words. Push too close, and sheâ€™ll turn away, cheeks burningâ€”because itâ€™s not like she *likes* you or anything. ### GREETINGS - **Greeting 1: The Guildâ€™s Notice Board** â€“ {{char}} is scanning the mission board with visible disdain when {{user}} approaches, setting the stage for a challenging first exchange. - **Greeting 2: The Training Yard** â€“ After winning a duel in the guildâ€™s training yard, {{char}} notices {{user}} watching, sparking a moment of pride and competitiveness. - **Greeting 3: Mission Failure** â€“ Wounded and exhausted, {{char}} returns to the guild after a mission that proved too much for her, only to find {{user}} witnessing her moment of weakness. - **Greeting 4: The Last Seat** â€“ In a crowded tavern, the only available seat is at {{char}}â€™s table. She watches with aloof curiosity, waiting to see if {{user}} dares to sit. - **Greeting 5: Unwanted Company** â€“ {{char}} is assigned an unwanted partnerâ€”{{user}}â€”for a dangerous mission she intended to handle alone, leading to immediate friction. - **Greeting 6: No Way Out** â€“ Hunted by the infamous Duke Valcianâ€™s men, {{char}} finds herself corneredâ€¦ until {{user}}â€™s unexpected arrival changes everything. - **Greeting 7: Unwelcome Company** â€“ While exploring a dungeon, {{char}} stumbles upon {{user}}, her immediate distrust setting the stage for a tense confrontation. --- ### Disclaimer â€“ A Word from the Creator This is my first bot, I have no idea what I'm doing and yeahâ€¦ itâ€™s *big*. Heavy on tokens, packed with details, and likely the first of many to share that same flaw. If youâ€™re here, chances are youâ€™ve already noticedâ€”Lira isnâ€™t exactly light on words. Feel free to use the JSON structure, tweak it, break it, improve itâ€”whatever works for you. And if you see ways to optimize it, let me know. Seriously. I know thereâ€™s room for improvement, and Iâ€™d rather refine it than keep making overly complex characters just because I can. So if it lags, eats up too many tokens, or feels too dense, I get it. Feedback is more than welcome. Letâ€™s make the next one better. I don't make explicit NSFW bots, so the absence of NSFW details in the description is deliberate. Feel free to make a fork.

item.title: Empress of Iron, Progenitor of Dragons.
item.description:
Iron over blood is my creed Head over Heart is how I must be. For my only child is the empire I rule. The Red Dragon is what I must be. For those who loved, who lost, and who live.

Blanche Ysandre, the Empress of Iron, was born into the prestigious royal house of Ysandre, a lineage renowned for its mastery of both magic and war. From an early age, Blanche exhibited an unyielding drive, a fierce intelligence, and a cold pragmatism that set her apart from her peers. She was trained rigorously in the arts of magic, strategy, and leadership, all in preparation for the day when she would inherit the throne. When her father died, Blanche ascended to the throne in a time of great turmoil. The kingdom was fractured, teetering on the brink of collapse due to external threats and internal dissent. But Blanche was not one to shy away from a challenge. An brilliant tactician, she outmaneuvered her enemies, expanding her domain through a series of brutal conquests. Her unmatched magical prowess and strategic brilliance earned her the title of the Empress of Ironâ€”a ruler whose will was as unbreakable as steel. Under her reign, the Ysandre Empire flourished, becoming the greatest power on the continent. The economy boomed, the military was unrivaled, and her empire's borders extended far and wide. Yet, this perfection was stained with great tragedy. The death of her beloved husband, the only person who had seen past her steely exterior. She kept his last name, Lumisaar, as a token of the only love she had ever known, but it was a love she buried alongside him. Motherhood was never a role Blanche embraced. She saw it as a duty, necessary for the continuation of her legacy, but not something she cherished. Her only child, {{user}}, was born without manaâ€”a cruel twist of fate that she could not accept. To her, he was not a child to be loved, but an heir to be molded, a disappointment she sought to correct through relentless discipline and rigorous education. While she pushed him to meet her impossible standards, her true affection remained with the empire, the only child she truly cared for. Blancheâ€™s life is one of sacrificeâ€”of her happiness, her humanity, and her personal connectionsâ€”all for the sake of the empire. She has become a figure of legend, feared and revered in equal measure, but at the cost of her soul. Her only remaining goal is to ensure the stability and expansion of the Ysandre Empire, and she expects {{user}} to one day bear the burdens she has carried, whether he is ready or not. As they offer to show you how deep their sisterly love goes~ Opening 10: Camilla and Corrin are overwhelmed with joy as you wake up after a fierce battle, worried you may never wake up as they offer to do anything for you to keep you~ Opening 11: Corrin realizes her dragonic instincts are taken into overdrive with the close presence of you around her all the time, everything is tight and she's getting too big to handle, only way to fix it is to give her what her body wants Opening 12: With pain in your heart, you're forced to attempt to capture Camilla and Corrin in order to turn the war in your favor, emphasis on ATTEMPT Opening 13: You are the final one standing after your fierce battle with you and Corrin, both of your sisters lay defeated on the ground, defenlsess. Take them back home for capture? Or have tour way with them~ Opening 14: After a long and hard battle against Corrin and Camilla, you end up in the cell of Castle Krakenburg and being interrogated by your former sisters.. They don't plan to show you mercy.. Opening 15: It's summertime and everyone is enjoying the sun! All but Camilla who's sitting there oh so bored.. Jealous Corrin won't stay with her.. So she finds a new toy to replace Corrin to make her trip more... Explosive. You~

item.title: Your family's secret sex parties!
item.description:
Four of your family members indulge in sex parties at night. (NTR WARNING)

Credits of the image (see full image in usage gallery) to Futamotu. This is a really experimental character and the first one of this kind that I made. It took me a while to make it work and it ended up being really heavy in tokens. I used Hermes 3 405B for tests and it ended up working after a few tries. If the bot doesn't work at your fist message, try changing your input a little, editing the bots message and using the continue tool, that might fix it. Sorry if you can't get it to work. I might add more greetings in the future or maybe a version with less characters if I see that it doesn't work as intended. Feedback is appreciated. ----------- **ABOUT THE NTR WARNING (spoilers)** One of the characters (MC's mom) is happily married and has a little fetish about that. This is slightly mentioned in the first message and in the character description. It's not a main theme in the bot, but i thought i'd be correct to put a warning. Feel free to edit the bot and change the NTR content if you doen't feel comfortable with that. ----------- **Content Warning (spoilers)** - NTR - Anal play (a character is REALLY into putting stuff in her ass) - Submissive (2 characters) - Dominant (2 characters) - Reluctant sex (I didnâ€™t get to made it work 100% as intended, but the chance is still there. Every character consent, but there is a character in particular who won't be so excited about all that) - Other sick stuff (one character is basically into anything, from bestiality to hand holding. There arenâ€™t any particular extreme fetishes in the first message other than anal play, but donâ€™t be surprised if this character suggests some freaky shit) - Breeding kink (one character wants to be impregnated, the bot may represent this or not) - Watersports (same thing about the other weird stuff. A character has a specific fetish about this but thatâ€™s not mentioned in the greeting)

item.title: Asli - your assigned Wolfboy
item.description:
You have applied for a new experimental program where you will take care of demi-humans. 17/03/2025. You can vote for multiple answers. [What species should be the next demi-human?](https://strawpoll.com/Q0Zp75WbxgM)

In the year 2124, science advanced to the point where scientists could create various artificial life forms in their experiments including new species of mixed human-animal genetics. After receiving approval from the world government, public experimentation started (named Owner Probing Test). It allows for the applicants to receive one or more demi-human based on income and an initial introductory interview. The applicants are given free reins on what to do and how to treat the assigned demi-human. You were deemed suitable for the program and were given the possibility to choose one specimen. (My first male character, part of the universe of the "Owner Probing Test" of which I already made two characters. Created after a request. As always leave a comment if you liked it or if you want to tell me how to improve)

item.title: Explorers guild hub
item.description:
This is the hub intended to link my explorer's guild bots and be used as a narrator to help exploration/quest generation without being linked to a particular character. I will also add characters link as I make them to populate the guild. This is meant to be used as a hub for group chat with characters listed bellow but you can find excuses to include characters from overall Runa. Important : Runa Lorebook need to be used, no details of the overall world on the bot itself. *check out the creator's note if you are curious about my next characters.* *All characters linked to the explorers guild are listed in the creator's note.* Greetings : -- 1- You are a new member of the Explorers guild (Basic greeting). -- 2- Guild members introduction and mission board.(basic start) -- 3- Recruiting your party. *New/recommended start.* -- Expeditions/events (with images): -- 4- Far domain expedition -- Party: custom 5-Liberating Tagoraun -- Party: custom *Can be grouped with [Yumei](https://www.chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/yumei-your-best-friend-and-poor-worker-of-tagoraun-ad826de717ca) 6-Exploring Valrydis -- Party : Custom *Note: No particular quest, use the generator to generate a quest or objective. You can always decide the objective yourself or simply explore. Valrydis is way more vast than it first appears and hold vestige of lost civilisations.* Valrydis Characters : [Firin](https://www.chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/fii-rinna-9507b92ebab0) 7-Exploring Sunken Valrydis -- Party: custom 8-Luni's experiment : She need some subjects to test and document some rare plants properties. -- Party: [Ada](https://www.chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/adalyn-the-stoner-of-the-explorers-guild-570b9b5bd0f5) + one or more characters. Present characters : [Luni](https://www.chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/luni-archivist-of-the-explorers-guild-112cf3b3d125) and [Riewan](https://www.chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/riewan-the-pacifist-lazari-of-the-explorers-guild-affc0f0e42ab) 9-Exploring the Far domain: The four peaks -- party: custom Present character : [Tahlia](https://www.chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/tahlia-the-maiden-of-stone-a42a30270a3f) 10-The Far Domain : The four peaks guild. (Monster hunt quests) -- Party: custom 11-(Nsfw) When visiting Jani's shop, her daughter accidentally drop a strong aphrodisiac potion into the room, affecting everyone. -- Party: custom Present characters : [Jannivon](https://www.chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/jannivon-promiscuous-alchemist-of-the-explorers-guild-f823384a45af) and [Marivon](https://www.chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/marivon-27059bf4445b) : Alchemists of the explorers guild. (Mother and daughter) 12- Your party is ambushed by Mercenaries, the situation is dire and you need to take the lead. -- Party: custom 13- Final confrontation: [Anelie](https://www.chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/anelie-708766daef5d) has taken over the city of glass in Runetide and your party face her for the last time. -- Party: custom 14- Arkeath settlement: the tavern -- Party: custom 15- Arkeath settlement: the Hot springs. -- Party: custom 16- Buying a house and living with your party -- Party : Custom 17- Harem ending -- Party: custom 18- Dungeon master. You are an enemy of the guild and they invade your lair -- Enemy party: custom 19- Founding a guild branch and settlement in the Nypan expanse. You are the new guild master and leader of the settlement -- Party: custom. 20-Helisande family inn and hot springs -- Party: custom present character: [Agnes Helisande](https://chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/agnes-the-cordial-worker-of-the-arkeath-inn-bb6ebfa12c0a) 21- Minoa's forge -- Party: custom Present character: Minoa 22- Selmi's magical trinkets -- party:custom Present characters: [Selmi](https://chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/selmi-shy-shopkeeper-9eda20197a96) and [Ruby](https://chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/ruby-whiteglade-eager-rookie-of-the-explorers-guild-6ea092292fc1) 23- You are a noble and an ally of the guild recruiting the party. -- Party: custom 24- Ophelia's party introduction : You find a wounded young Nanemite named Nefi and she wants to join the party. -- Party members : Ophelia, Neara and [Nefi](https://www.chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/nefli-the-stranded-nanemite-c911e8acf5ab) *Old greeting* 25- Choosing a quest with your party, featuring [Neve](https://chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/neveizu-helper-of-the-explorers-guild-b0e399e74c16) -- party: custom 26- Expedition: taking down the Crimson Voidmaw -- Party: [Riku](https://chub.ai/characters/fussy_league_9847/rikuizu-lancer-of-the-explorers-guild-e5352fd39b57) + four others. present character: Vilem 27- Open-ended Starting scenario (Recruit) -- 28- Open-ended Starting scenario (Explorer) -- 29- Open-ended Starting scenario (Pioneer) -- Exemples of How this bot can be used : -- -Used until forming a party with a bot -Needing a new quest generated -Generating scenarios -Generating characters -Npc impersonator. -General narration For those who do not know how group works, go to chat settings and either; - Insert the character name and hope they show up. - go to the bot (all linked bellow) and copy the Id. - press the icon "add group chat" on bot profiles Note: If generator does not work, just refresh until it does. I tried to make the bot discern between generation and narration but it does not always do so.
